# Incident Flow Wireframe Reference

Use this textual wireframe when the lab mentions "provided low-fi wireframes".

## Screen 1 路 Incident Overview
- Fields: District dropdown, Incident type radio buttons, Add photo button.
- Primary CTA: "Start report" (disabled until type selected).
- Status strip shows last sync timestamp.

## Screen 2 路 Location Capture
- Map placeholder + manual address entry.
- "Use GPS" button shows spinner and fallback message if signal weak.
- Offline badge appears when GPS unavailable.

## Screen 3 路 Details Entry
- Large text area for description with glove-friendly buttons.
- Photo upload queue with progress indicators.

## Screen 4 路 Summary & Submit
- Preview of captured data, editable fields.
- Submit button + "Save for later" secondary option.
- Confirmation banner location indicated at top of screen.
